post_text: Our third grade scholars learned a valuable lesson about being kind to each other. One by one scholars came up and shared something unkind that someone has said or done to them. They then squeezed a little toothpaste onto the plate. At the end, scholars were given the assignment of trying to put the toothpaste back into the tube. They soon learned that they couldn't put all of the toothpaste back in, just like we can't completely undo the damage that happens when we say or do unkind things to each other. Thanks to our amazing scholars for a great discussion on how we can make the world a better place by spreading more kindness!
